title: Huck
description: From the visionary mind of Mark Twain, comes a world where only one man can save us. Uncover the truth behind the legend.
quote: This is for freedom, justice, and the Huckleberry way.
altHero: Jean-Claude Van Damme as a shirtless Huck Finn wielding twin sai
alt2: Huck on a big tree branch holding up a paintbrush that is glowing blue
alt3: Huck with Jim, an Asian man wearing a sunhat
alt4: Jim and Huck in monks robes
